heading: HB00117
0: AN ACT EXEMPTING START-UP ENTERPRISES FROM TAXES ARISING FROM THE FIRST TWO YEARS OF OPERATION
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00117
FULL TITLE : AN ACT EXEMPTING START-UP ENTERPRISES FROM TAXES ARISING FROM THE FIRST TWO YEARS OF OPERATION
SHORT TITLE : Start-up Business Bill
ABSTRACT : Grants tax exemption for Start Ups for the first two years of operation, provided that these enterprises are duly registered businesses that are not affiliates, subsidiaries or franchises of any existing company and do not have any previous or other existing registered businesses.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAR, MARK A.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY ON 2016-07-26
